features: ✔✔【12 different types of robots】: 12 different building robots which can move on land or wate for your child to build, two levels as to complexity, starting from entry level for younger child to advanced level for older child to challenge their manipulative skills.This is a great way for your child to get started in robotics toy.

✔✔【No batteries needed】: Powered by the sun,no batteries needed.The robot kit includes a solar power panel that collects solar heat energy into an electric energy drive motor, which drives the gears to make the machine run smoothly.Offers your child practical experiences of working with green technology, let them learn about renewable energy sources and have fun doing it with.

✔✔【Support STEM education】: This science toys will teach children how to engineer a robot that uses solar power, while help to develop manual dexterity,problem solving skills, improve logical thinking,self-confidence and promotes the importance of teamwork & collaboration. It is also a perfect toy to encourage learning of mechanics and engineering in young children,enhance your children's Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills.

✔✔【DIY for CREATION】: Improve your child's imagination and creativity by challenging them to build their own robots with 190 easy-build pieces parts & accessories. We include guide for 12 robot designs in details from level 1 to level 2, easy to build as guide step by step.It's fit for boys and girls aged 8-10 and older, great robot toys encourage your child to learn through play.

✔✔【Ideal gift 】: All pieces are sturdy and durable, which are made of premium quality harmless and non-toxic ABS plastic. Great gift for birthday| |Children's Day| Christmas| Chanukah| Easter| STEM| summer camp activities| back to school.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12 DIFFERENT TYPES OF ROBOTS The 12-in-1 Education Solar Robot Toys kit can be assemed into 12 different styles robots which can move on land or water.There are two levels in building the robot as to complexity.Entry level: Puppy-Bot,Beetle-Bot,Zombie-Bot,Quad-Bot,Turtle-Bot,Walker-Bot; Challenge childs and students manipulative skills with second level: Row-Bot,Surf-Bot,Roly-Poly-Bot,Buggy-Bot,Slither-Bot,Crab-Bot. EDUCATION AND CHALLENGE This is a great way for your child to get started in robotics.After they amuse themselves with the entry level, can challenge their manipulative skills with second level; Besides,this solar robot kit will teach childs and students how to engineer a robot that uses solar power, while challenging manual dexterity, and developing problem solving, self-confidence. DIY for CREATION for Aged 10 and Up The kit comes with 190 easy-build pieces parts & accessories and detailed instruction which enable childs use their infinite imagination to build and create their own robots. Fit for boys and girls aged 10 and up, designed to support child's creativity as they grow. It is a perfect toy to encourage learning of mechanics and engineering in young children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So many ways to configure it!! It was a gift for a 9 year old. He absolutely loved it!! Never stops playing with it and he's had it for almost a year! Great great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's fun for those kids who like STEM

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a present and we haven’t opened the package for several months, when we put it together (a bit difficult, adult help needed for sure), the solar panel did not work. After sending an email to the manufacturer (in the product brochure) they answered back within 24 hours and they have sent me a replacement solar panel for it with no charge. Excellent customer service, will buy other products from them in the future.The only disadvantage of this little robot is there is no stop bottom, you have to disconnect it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Robotics Toy - Definitely Needs Adult Supervision for Younger Children
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this toy for my 7-year-old grandson. It was a ittle more complicated than I thought. Should have stuck with the recommended age of 8 - 12. Luckily, my 33-year-old son, his Uncle, is very intuitive and patient and helped him build some of the bots. Bots are real fun once put together. Definitely teaches dexterity and understanding directions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Same review as other similar items Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Small. Fun to put together but disappointing. Small and doesn't work unless fully charged by sunlight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: GREAT TO GIVE FOR ANYONE OVER THE AGE OF 7. HOURS OF FUN PLAY TIME. EASY TO USE AND EASY TO PUT TOGETHER.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of junk.
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews. But I need to tell you that this is a piece of junk. ALTHOUGH, the fine print on the instruction manual makes it seem like the manufacturing isn’t very precise. So maybe some robots actually work 🤷‍♀️First of all, it’s not kid friendly. The instructions are pretty confusing for a kid. Notice the packaging says “easy-build pieces” not “easy build.” My husband and I ended up building it ourselves.First we built the walker-bot. Immediately after we connected the power and it started walking, it fell apart. We thought we did something wrong so we checked the manual and rebuilt it. Connected it to power, then it fell apart again.Next, we tried the Roly Poly-bot. Once we were finished, the pieces didn’t even fit together properly! I tried holding it together to see if it would roll. It just fell over and spun around, and then the pieces fell off.I couldn’t believe it y’all. Complete waste of money. I’m actually really good at following instructions and building things. I put together all the furniture in our house, etc. This thing is just so poorly made. My kid is so bummed and so are we. I wish I could give it zero stars.👎👎👎👎👎

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent gift to youngsters with an interest to building with challenge
reviews.reviewText: It was thouroughly enjoyed by my grandson

The idea behind this is great, but the quality is not great. The gears don't fit well together, which means it doesn't always work. A lot of slack in the parts means it doesn't really fit well together.
Pour un jeune intéressé par la technique. C'est parfait comme jeu.
Got this for my boy, open up package, only to find instructions manual in Russian!! Seriously?!
Very flimsy product. Poor quality materials and the motor is so weak. I would not go near this. Not worth the money.
